page.title: 12Amenities
page.content: As can be seen from the count, the area has very few amenities.The village of Arlecdon is in fact quite well served but the amenities are not evident in the count as they are all present in the part of the village which is included in the next "block" to the south. The remaining services and amenities can easily be summarised here as being a sewage works,a church,two public houses and a limited bus service. The church (St.Michael's) is situated between the village of Arlecdon and Asby and is somewhat out on a limb.It is an old building and the lack of conregation is not helped by the fact that it is fairly remote.
